website_summaries.verdict: High-quality, well-made bee suit with excellent sting protection and good ventilation for novice or experienced beekeepers alike.
pros: Lightweight, breathable three-layer fabric keeps you cool in hot weather while offering exceptional sting protection
Large detachable hood keeps veil positioned well away from face
Durable brass zippers and lots of pockets for tools
Happy apiarists consider it well worth the higher price tag
cons: Zippers need lubrication to work smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Works great with killer Africanized bees
customer_reviews.text: I do africanized bee removals in Cochise county, AZ. This bee suit has been a game changer! It has helped me remain cool without taking a single sting. I love the pockets for tools. I did have some snagging issues getting on and off of a roof due to the grippy asphalt, but nothing worth giving up the suit. I am an average size female (5’6” 140 lbs) and I ordered a medium. It fits perfect. Tips: Keep the suit tucked into your boots! (I had a couple of ladies join me in my veil after climbing up the suit leg). Gently rinse suit in bathtub after each use. Be extremely gentle with the veil.
customer_reviews.author: mac2_03

customer_reviews.title: Buy this beesuit if you don't want me to get stung
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to bees so it is critical I have a great beesuit. I did a lot of research before choosing this one. It's perfect. For the entire season, I did not get stung through it not one time. It's easy to get on and off, has a lot of pockets, and is very breezy. Only concern is that the sizing is off. Had to return it twice for proper size and probably could have used the smallest even then, but got tired of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Laraleeloaf

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's a GREAT suit. Need to return for a larger size
customer_reviews.text: Followed their sizing instructions to a T (height & weight) and it was a bit small. Otherwise it's a GREAT suit. Need to return for a larger size. Would be nice if they could use regular womens/mens sizes to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Removed four hornet's nests - not dead nor dying.
customer_reviews.text: Pest control is so expensive in my area I figured I'd just buy this for a bit less than they would charge me - and walk away with something. I've always wanted to try beekeeper so it gave me a good excuse. I removed multiple nests - some having 30-50 mean hornets apiece - and I didn't get stung and wasn't too hot in the suit. It gave me an opportunity to attempt to move the things without killing them. Successfully. I bought some decent gloves and a smoker with it - but I didn't need the smoker. I will use it for Halloween though!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Everette

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you protected
customer_reviews.text: Size runs very small. I normally wear a medium to large. Ordered an XL after reading other reviews. Not easy to get in and out of but it's the BEST protection I've used. Will buy another if it is ever on sale. Been keeping bees for 9 years and I think it outperforms the other expensive suits. Could use thumb straps but that is nitpicking. Great pockets. Lubricate the zippers before first use.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suite due to a higher than normal yellow jacket season. Once I put the suite on I felt really exposed and didn’t feel it would keep me from getting stung. I was wrong. I watched as multiple yellow jackets attempted to sting me with no success. I love how breathable this suite is and still providing great protection. This suite is worth every penny. Thank you for a quality suite.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Chainmail Bee Suit
customer_reviews.text: I have grumpy feral bees and this thing is like a suit of armor against stings. Has some weight to it but breathes really well. Pay close attention to the zipper junction under the chin, it will seal up but don't get careless at that spot. I am 6'2", 250lbs and the XXL is a good fit. If you are on the fence about the $$, it is worth it. Zippers are heavy too btw. The only potential flaw might be the outer mesh being susceptible to a tear, be mindful of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS SUIT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this suit to do extractions. Have done one already, and the suit is phenomenal. Suck it up and send the money. Don't waste your time or money on the knock-offs like I did... just get it right the first time and invest in an Ultra-Breeze. No stings, and by far the coolest suit out there. Every time the air moves, you feel it. Makes extraction or maintaining ago hives a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality,  perfect bee suit!!
customer_reviews.text: I had two bee suits last season, the traditional ones where the zipper broke twice, and it was so hot. So I got this in anticipation of next season. I was excited to get it and try it on! Walking through my heated house I could feel the breeze coming through! The way the hood sits, I don't think that the bees will be able to sting through this time! The zipper is metal, and covered at the gaps so I don't expect it to break or the bees to find a way in! So excited to get to my hives this year!!
customer_reviews.author: AmBuer Edenburn

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have gotten one sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I’m thoroughly impressed with this suit. I live in Texas and all I have is feral hives. They’re survivors, but ill-tempered and ready to sting at the drop of a hat. I’ve worked my bees twice now wearing this suit in shorts and shirt; not a single sting. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool and secure. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit because I have a couple of hot hives. I got tired of wearing two pairs of pants and a jacket underneath my bee jacket. It was uncomfortable in the midday sun. Now I am cool and and secure. It isn't cheap but in my opinion it is worth every cent. Great customer service. The second day I had it a thorn tore a small hole in the outside mesh. I emailed them and they mailed out a swatch to repair it the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool times ahead - Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Living in Phoenix area, it gets real hot out here in the summer this suite is great. it isn't actually made of canvas type material but has three layers of various types of mesh. This really does let the air in; you really can feel a breeze through this suite. OK, it cost a lot more than most suites, but if you are in hot weather, or easily sweat, this it the suite for you.
customer_reviews.author: JYoder

customer_reviews.title: This suit does it all.
customer_reviews.text: I did some fast research on these suits and decided to spend the extra on this one. Every year we are "found" by some sort of wasps or hornets, and are swarmed either cutting brush, mowing the lawn, or weed whacking. This suit was impervious to stings, allowing us to dig up these nests with a shovel or pickaxe during the day. It is reasonably cool and comfortable, certainly compared to the traditional suits. Not being a professional beekeeper but needing it for pest control I highly recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: Millbrook 73

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you how much I love this suit
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this suit. I just had a traditional jacket from a local store. I was so hot in that thing and I have been stung a few times. I feel safe in this suit and much cooler. I wore shorts and a t-shirt under this. I still sweated, but not like before. I highly recommend this suit. I'm a woman and I'm 5'8". I'm normally an XL or 1X, and this fit me fine. It could probably be a bit smaller but I like the extra room.
customer_reviews.author: SondiH

customer_reviews.title: and is indeed lightweight and extremely breathable - really amazing and helpful in the summer
customer_reviews.text: This suit has been literally life-saving for me. I have only used it twice so far, but had an anaphylactic reaction to a bee sting earlier this year that landed me in the hospital. Now I'm an Epi-pen-carrying farmgirl with lots of outside projects to take care of, and refuse to lock myself indoors. This suit has protected me well, and is indeed lightweight and extremely breathable - really amazing and helpful in the summer. Now I'm back to weeding and gardening and feel well-guarded.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherdess

customer_reviews.title: BEST.SUIT.EVER
customer_reviews.text: The cost nearly kept me from getting this suit but I'm so glad I went ahead and took the plunge!!! This is hands down the best suit on the market. I love it! I am a female. 5'7", and wear a size 12/14. I got the Large and love the way it fits. Yeah, it's a little loose and long so it bunches up a bit around my shoes but it it's certainly not way too big and has plenty of room for bending and moving about. I love that I can wear this suit over a tank and shorts and I'm protected! I LOVE THIS SUIT!!
customer_reviews.author: OkieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate protection and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Cool and ultimate sting protection. I've haven't been stung yet. Zippers are all mettle and the entire suit is great quality. My only suggestion is the pockets they put on the side for hive tool, etc is great but I wish it was on the from of the leg. Just in front and a little lower from where a pocket would be on a pair of pants. It's easy to get the tool out of the side pocket but a pain to get it back in. Still, I highly recommend it. Ultimate protection and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: MattP1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for creating this product. I live in North Carolina where the summer has high temperature, and very high humidity. My other bee suit was practically killing me (cotton, felt like heat stroke). When there's a breeze going, I'm not even the slightest bit bothered by wearing this suit. You'll still sweat a little bit when there isn't a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! Zippers are sturdy and I never get stung, well maybe once or twice but not the suit's fault. You have to make sure all zippers are closed and Velcro is engaged because they will find a way in and then its "go time!" It is very ventilated and helps for those Hot days of summer. Well worth the investment over the cheaper suits that will not last you more than a season. I am going into my third season and its holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Best Suit Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a moderate allergy to bee stings. I had to find a bee suit that would be suitable for Florida's climate but still protect from bee stings. I've worn traditional bee suits, but I end up sweating to death and once wet they protect little from stings anyway. This is the best suit I've ever worn. It is comfortable and provides exceptional protection from stings. I would not hesitate to recommend this anyone who is in my circumstance and needs full protection without the discomfort of a traditional suit.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this suit for my son who is a full time beekeeper in Georgetown, Guyana, South America. The land of many waters, 10% of the Amazon Rain forest and many happy, productive, vicious Africanized bees!! He gets stung everyday. He described it in excitement as a ' Space Age' suit. Whatever that means..... Said he used it and no stings. Expensive product but I will buy a few more over the next few months. Thank you Ultra Breeze!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theodora Madekurozwa

customer_reviews.title: No stings yet, even with shorts!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning beekeeper and decided on these suits after much research. I am very happy with them; I liked my first one enough that when it was time to order a second suit so that friends could enjoy my hives with me, I opted to buy the same one. No stings yet, and I can wear shorts and a tank top underneath in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit to wear in the heat of the Louisiana ...
customer_reviews.text: Great suit to wear in the heat of the Louisiana summer. I can wear shorts while in this suit. In the rare times there is a breeze, I can feel it blowing through it. I've noticed the bees like to head-butt me more while I'm wearing this suit. I'm assuming it's because the hood is a bit darker than my last. I haven't gotten stung in it yet.
customer_reviews.author: mike waugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth all the hype!!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to bee keeping and had heard many good things about the Ultra Breeze Suit. I decided that I would invest in this for working with my bees. I am very happy with it. It fits well and allows air in to keep me a little cooler while I am working out in the sun. I like the many pockets and that they are handy. I would recommend this to anyone that does beekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great product - pay up the butt for it though!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit - as a new(ish) beekeeper, this suit is 20x the other one I bought. I don't think they can sting through it at all. The downside is how insanely costly it is - the only reason it is not 5* because the cost is insane, but I do need the product. I hope they are able to bring the cost down in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely NOT recommend. Will be returning it for a refund
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit well around the neck. Tried once and the bees found a way in quickly. Ouch. Would definitely NOT recommend. Will be returning it for a refund. Save yourself the time, and the bee stings to the face and DO NOT purchase this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Janell Haws

customer_reviews.title: keeps all bees out
customer_reviews.text: I have numerous bees suits but this one takes the cake by far, and i never write reviews but felt compelled to do so because this suit is so good. you could be naked in this suit and never get stung, it is truly the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I've heavily used one for almost 10 years and it's going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Chucko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome In Hot Weather
customer_reviews.text: I kept looking at this for a year. Did not want to spend so much on a suit but now I am the envy of other beekeepers. Love the suit. Wore it in 94° degree weather and could tell the difference. If it is really hot you will still feel the heat but the ventilation made it more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysi

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools make for confident workers!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my first year beekeeping and I am SO glad my husband encouraged me to spend the extra money for a good suit. I have been dealing with some less-than-pleasant honeybees and I haven't been stung through this suit a single time! I feel so much safer with this thing on. I bought a Large and I'm 5' 6" and average build. It fits very well- a little baggy, which is good, because it doesn't bind or pull when I'm bending or reaching. Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Breeze customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic to honeybees but love the hobby. I wanted a sting proof suit. I've owned this suit for several months with no sting. With the proper precautions this is the perfect bee suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well protected in this suit if you re tired of bees stinging through your poorly designed suit
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding suit - fits well and protects very well - easily breathable allowing a cool breeze to pass through the suit. I live in an area that can get wRm during the summer, having a suit that is cooler works well for me. Suit is designed to keep stingers away from the body by thickly designed matting.
customer_reviews.author: fred j razo

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile investment
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very cool, very protective. I'm really glad I spent the extra money to get this suit. The full zipper up the legs is a great feature. now I don;t have to take my boots off to put my suit on. It is very well made. definitely a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: G.Benson

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit and weighs a ton
customer_reviews.text: Had to return! Horrible fit and super heavy. The crotch was at my knees and the pant length was situated above my ankles! It was sooo heavy.
customer_reviews.author: DF1

customer_reviews.title: So long cheap knock-offs!
customer_reviews.text: This suit made a believer out of me that cheap knock-offs are just that. It's definitely more substantial than the competition and well-made. Don't get me wrong, those other suits are ok, but this one is just better. July in the Mid-Atlantic/South will still be hot as all get out, but at least you'll be a lot less likely to pass out from heat exhaustion.
customer_reviews.author: LooksSkyward

customer_reviews.title: sting proof
customer_reviews.text: Sting proof suit, comfortable for worm areas, bit heavy, expensive.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the one pictured
customer_reviews.text: This discounted UltraBreeze suit is not the one pictured nor is it a large. The leg zippers only go to below the knee, not to the hip as pictured and it’s absolutely not a large. Maybe a medium but more likely a small.
customer_reviews.author: Debra N.

customer_reviews.title: Dynamite Suit
customer_reviews.text: No suit will be "cool" during hot, humid weather, yet this one does allow air flow. I can also testify that it works very well in preventing stings from penetrating to your skin. First time I wore it, I had an overly defensive encounter with one of my hives. Many bees went into action to protect the hive, and none of the stings got through. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue in Quinton

customer_reviews.title: ... on hot days and also the design is really good for keeping the bee stings to a minimum
customer_reviews.text: This suit is heavier than my other bee suits but it is so much cooler on hot days and also the design is really good for keeping the bee stings to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Eli W.

customer_reviews.title: I stay cool and protected
customer_reviews.text: WOW....All through the summer I sweat working the hives (and drip on the bees if I am not careful which irritates them a bit,) now that I have this suit, I stay cool and protected, no more annoyed girls. I can feel air movement right through the suit. I am comfortable and they are comfortable. MUCH cooler than the jacket I have that's not ventilated, that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Great material
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband's birthday. He loves it. Great fit. Great material. Perfect pocket placement and great quality. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. He calls this the Cadillac of Bee suits.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. You pay more then others, but you get what you pay for and this is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Tangren

customer_reviews.title: Great Beekeeping suit
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the beezneez! Glad I sprung for this even though it is relatively dear compared to most of its competitors. It is well made, machine washed fine and so far no stings! I used the detailed measuring hints on the Ultra breeze web site to make sure I ordered the correct size. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: ... have one hive so this was pricey but I'm happy I bought it every time I wear it
customer_reviews.text: I only have one hive so this was pricey but I'm happy I bought it every time I wear it. I tried a jacket with veil but got stung in quad and calf on same leg through my jeans and that was enough. My bees don't seem as happy as the ones I see on youtube :) Quality is incredible. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Breezy, but not bee proof.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3" about 125 pounds. The small fits me pretty well, but it hangs rather low in the crotch. I wore a bungee cord for a belt last time, and pulled it up a bit. That helped. I'm considering a pair of suspenders on the outside, but that may smash the fabric too close to my skin, and allow stings. Not sure yet. Btw, this suit is NOT sting proof. I was just stung on the shoulder through the suit. That kind of surprised me. I'll wear something with sleeves underneath next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kamalani Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love my suit
customer_reviews.text: Really beautifully designed. I'm 5'8 and 168# if that helps with sizing. The medium is roomy, large was huge. Great pockets, nice heavy duty zip.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars doesn't do this suit justice...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars doesn't do this suit justice. I'm 6'3 and the XXL is long enough to keep me covered and cool while out in the bee yard. I'm recommending this suit to everyone and I hope this small family business continues to make suits for a very very long time. Made in the USA too!
customer_reviews.author: N. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Still better then a standard bee suit
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable in hot air almost just the same as any other unless you have wind going. Doean't kling at all from sweat. Still better then a standard bee suit.
customer_reviews.author: Evan M Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Compared to my old beekeeper suit I wonder why I ...
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my old beekeeper suit I wonder why I didn't get the ultra breeze sooner it is a little pricey but in my opinion well worth it if you're going to spend any time working with bees this is the Suit to have
customer_reviews.author: RB gardener

customer_reviews.title: The best, most comfortable bee suit on the market
customer_reviews.text: The best, most comfortable bee suit on the market! Easy to get into and out of. It is cool to work in and I never worry about getting stung even though it is mesh constructed. Extremely well built!
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Works as quoted, lighter than expected, and so easy to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice now, in a yard with 125 hives. No stings yet, and definitely cool to wear, in temperature that is.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stout

customer_reviews.title: Well ventilated and sting proof
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well ventilated and sting proof. I deal with hundreds of hives and this was a game changer of a suit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin coy

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Tired of fighting with a couple of hot hives. Haven't been stung since I started using this suit. Still hot but with the slightest breeze it definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Indy

customer_reviews.title: Stop researching and buy now
customer_reviews.text: I live in the south where it’s hot and humid year round. This is the only suit I will wear
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product. i have never seen a suit that ...
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product. i have never seen a suit that even comes close to this quality. now is it worth 100.00 more than any suit out there ? thats up to you to decide but i dont regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Marco Villavicencio

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I already had a jacket that I thought was Ultra Breeze. I now realize it was a knock off. This is very good quality. I did two cut-outs with thousands of angry bees attacking for an hour at a time. Wore shorts and a t shirt under Ultra Breeze. Not a single sting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay for quality.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has been wearing this suit for 5 years. This bought for son to help father and learn beekeeping without fear of getting stung. Wore with just underwear on hot summer day with no problems. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Harms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are truly ventilated. No more sweating in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: ChowOwner

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit!!! Heavy compared to nylon suits but much cooler and the only way you get stung is if you smash a bee into the suit which is very rare. Great quality and made in the USA witch is hard to find. I run several hundred hives and this suit is worth the money in South Georgia.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but melts.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Warning however IT MELTS EASY. Keep that smoker far away from you! I have a funny patch now on my leg where I melted it.
customer_reviews.author: Xaidin

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, very comfortable, even in the Texas heat! Only complaint, the side zippers are little hard to zip up, if you open them to get into your pants pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it all day
customer_reviews.text: This suit is so incredibly cool compared to the standard canvas. Breeze goes right through. I am 5'7, and wear a women's 8, and the medium fits great.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: simply amazing. I work with African bees
customer_reviews.text: simply amazing. I work with African bees , and this suit is a must have. it breathes as advertised, jut be careful not to get your smoker too close or it will burn.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome suit! It's ventilated as advertised and easy to wear. I'm not a beekeeper but got tired of being stung by yellow jackets. Haven't had a problem since I started wearing the suit.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and keeps me Cool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the hot days of summer. I can use suit with a T-shirt and shorts and be protected and not sweat to death.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Pockets are nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter. She loves it. Pockets are nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: mklalv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! Well made, good pocket placement, closeable pockets would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G Coleman

customer_reviews.title: great idea
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately because of my body style ( long torso and short legs) it would not fit me correctly so I had to return it and purchased just the jacket which is great, any breeze at all and you can feel it through the jacket, no stings and would recommend either product . only suggestion is as soon as you get it apply some beeswax to the zippers as they are stiff and hard to operate after about 4 or 5 times after applying the wax they work fine
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: Stands up well to abuse and I stay a lot cooler
customer_reviews.author: Hawk61

customer_reviews.title: No negative comments
customer_reviews.text: I can’t think of anything wrong with this suit. It’s cool, breezy, thick and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I did a cutout with this suit last night and it was AWESOME! Zero stings with an angry hive through the suit. Only sting I got was because I had a headlamp on and they got me through where the veil was touching my skin because of the light. My fault entirely. High quality zippers, great elastic in the bottom of the legs to grip your ankles and tight Velcro on your wrists. I still used duct tape to secure these to the gloves and boots I was wearing. Very worth the price and now I can wear other clothes under my suit and not die from heat. I'm 5'11 240lbs, large frame and the XXL fit well perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Legion Honey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So much cooler than regular bee suits! Can't imagine having to go back to a regular suit during the summer months. Highly recommended. Best decision I made purchasing this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Covered in bees and no issues. First time having bees so I'm a little shaky/unsure. Very happy that I went with ultra breeze. Comfortable, cool and safe, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: big mike

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Will let you know when summer comes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it! You won't get stung ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth it! You won't get stung wearing this suit. It is well-made, I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best bee suit ever...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, plus the best part it's made in the good ol' USA. USA, USA, USA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Leyshion jr.

customer_reviews.title: I had a bad experience with a cheap suit and two upset nucs
customer_reviews.text: Wow! As a beginning beekeeper, I had a bad experience with a cheap suit and two upset nucs. I was very tempted to give up active hive management at that point. This suit restored my confidence, and has been extremely beneficial during this abnormally hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Pollock

customer_reviews.title: this thing is the best. the only thing is keep it away from ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is the best. the only thing is keep it away from your smoker if you have flames going. melts easy. telling my friends about it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: dan z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit!
customer_reviews.text: Best suit on the market! I've never been stung through it. It's a little expensive but worth not having to deal with bee stings!
customer_reviews.author: J-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great bee suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bee suit and I love it! Very easy to get in and out of, nicely ventilated, and I like that the veil is attached to the suit. Have not been stung with it on and I doubt I ever will be. I love this suit! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am about to order a second one for my wife! Cool and comfortable, and I haven't been stung yet!
customer_reviews.author: 1952Jeep

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suit. Definitely cooler that any other option
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suit. Definitely cooler that any other option. I have become allergic to bee stings- this has eliminated stings when I work my bees.
customer_reviews.author: Petrea Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: But it fits well and its super ventilated. It is well made
customer_reviews.text: I haven't met any bees in this suit yet. But it fits well and its super ventilated. It is well made. I'm glad I spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The price was a bit high but this suit is beyond words. My wife and I love them!!! We would recommend them to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bee suit
customer_reviews.text: The BEST bee suit. I held out because of the expense, but am so happy I finally splurged! So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: s odowd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes a huge difference inspecting hives in the heat of the summer!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Bee Suit
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this suit. I had many bee hives to cleanout of out side- over head can lights, the bee's attacked me. There was no stings through the suit. I wore a tee shirt & shorts under the suit, it is very well ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: Zurger

customer_reviews.title: COOLER and Breezy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought and they are a little on the heavy side because of the materials used but it does ventilate better than the old style bee suits and with the zippers in the legs it is easier to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best darn way to not get stung
customer_reviews.text: Best darn way to not get stung. Go ahead and spend the extra money - it is way worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Harvey

customer_reviews.title: very happy over all
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built,no issues. A bit expensive though. very happy over all.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Sobkowich

customer_reviews.title: This suit is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is great!!! Very high quality made craftsman ship all the way. I wish I could buy everything made in USA . I was afraid the xlarkge was going to be to small. I am 5/10 230 pounds and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEE SUIT EVER
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I keep bees in Texas. (HOT!) Not only is it cooler but I haven’t had one sting with it on (I wear a tank top and shorts underneath). I wish I had bought it years ago. It’s pricey but I sew so I know how much time and expertise was required to make it. The fit is a bit odd. The torso is long. I am 5’1” and 110lbs and an XS fits (the S was huge on me), I wish the legs were a couple inches longer- not a big deal though, I wear thick socks to protect my ankles just in case the suit pulls up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bryant

customer_reviews.title: 2XL fit me fine, 6'2" tall and 285 lbs
customer_reviews.text: 2XL fit me fine, 6'2" tall and 285 lbs, heavy weight material - zippers worked fine. Love the leg zippers makes getting into the suit easy. I had a 4xl suit from another company so read the suit sizing carefully - they lay the suit down on the floor for measurements not your measurements! Wish it had thumb guides to hold the sleeves in place. ( I plan on putting my own in place.)
customer_reviews.author: Harold C. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves her suit as she has helped me ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her suit as she has helped me on multiple occassions with our bee hives and has not been stung.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Best Money you will spend if your not wanting to get stung and in a hot southern climate
customer_reviews.text: Best Suit I have ever used. In SW Florida it gets hotter then a 2 dollar pistol, and this suit works so well its unbelievable. I could not be happier. I have a bad local reaction to stings and have alot of hot hives, I normally work in a cloud of ticked off bees and not one sting through my suit. The gloves I just ordered from another company is another horror story, but this suit is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: The Cat's Meow of Bee suits
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I needed to assist in moving an apiary that had been left unmanaged for a few years. IT IS AWESOME! I wore shorts and a t-shirt under it and was mostly comfortable. So much better than my Cotton be jacket! Not a single sting even while tearing apart hot hives.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: nice vail
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! Easy on / off. zippers work great keeps bees out (so far). Vail allows for good visual of surrounding. Air goes through helping to keep me cool. Pockets have been little tricky to see, open but I'm a 5'5"240 lb. WomAN wearing clothes suit. It's roomy, but easy to get around in.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bee suit. Glad I spent the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Harris

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Breeze or Ultra awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am an beginner to itermediate bee keeper and this is a Great suit, very comfortable, awesome ventilation, lightweight and very well thought out with maximum protection, This suit gave me a new sense of confidence and purpose with my beekeeping activities. Worth the price for beginner to expert. I live in the southwest and with the unusually high temps make this suit a must. Plenty of protection for anyone, trust me don't skip on protection, pay the price and get one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Skybullets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent suit, people need to order 2 sizes larger than they are tho, which I did. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Taylor

product_meta.title: Ultra Breeze Large Beekeeping Suit with Veil, 1-Unit, White
product_meta.description: Size:LaregeBee Protected and Bee Cool with the Ultra Breeze Beekeeping Suits and Jackets. The Ultra Breeze is made of three layers of ventilated mesh fabric. The depth of the layers provides outstanding protection against stings while keeping you cool. Other single layer suits trap your body heat and are uncomfortably hot. Single layer suits have a thin barrier against stings, especially when wet from sweat. With the Ultra Breeze, beekeeping is a pleasure not a chore. Easy on and easy off – the Ultra Breeze has 2-way YKK brass zippers on the jacket and suits (up the entire length of the leg), multiple pockets, and a roomy detachable hood designed to keep the veil off your face. Made in America using high quality durable materials and excellent workmanship, the Ultra Breeze is the World-feet s Best Bee Suit. Sized to fit comfortably, our suits and jackets are machine washable; the hood is hand washable. Sizing is men-feet s sizing, so women will wear smaller sizes than usual. When selecting a suit, the most important measurement is from the back of the neck (at your shoulders) to the inseam of the pants. The approximate measurements are: X Small (34-inch neck-inseam, 5-feet tall, 100-pound), Small (37-inch neck-inseam, 5-feet 5-inch tall, 130-pound), Medium (37-inch neck- inseam, 5-feet 8-inch tall, 160-pound), Large (38-inch neck-inseam, 6-feet + tall, 210-pound), X Large (40-inch neck-inseam, 6-feet + tall, 260-pound) and XX Large (41-inch neck- inseam, 6-feet +, 290+ -pound.). If you fall between sizes, it is best select the larger size to allow for bending and stretching as you work with your bees.
feature_bullets: Ultra breeze beekeeping suit with veil
Excellent workmanship; brass zippers; durable ventilated fabric layers are polyester or polyester/vinyl
Machine wash cold, hand wash hood, do not use bleach, do not wring or twist
Ventilated fabric keeps you cool and comfortable
